Our Story

Chettinad Cotton

Light brown chettinad cotton saree with butta

₹1,699

Crafted from 100% pure cotton, these sarees are lightweight, breathable, and perfect for everyday wear as well as festive occasions.

Description

Product Details: Fabric: 100% Pure Cotton Weave: Chettinad Cotton Border: One-side Kanchi border Length: 6.20 meters Count: 100 count Blouse: Running blouse included

Care Instructions

Hand wash separately in cold water using mild detergent. Do not soak or bleach. Dry in shade; do not wring or tumble dry. Iron while slightly damp using medium heat. Store in a cool, dry place; wrap in cotton or muslin cloth. Avoid direct contact with perfumes and deodorants.
